titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1154) to remedy injury to the United States textile and apparel industries caused by increased imports.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-297.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 305 - 111 (Record Vote No: 318).

bill.summary: 9/9/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1154 (textile and apparel industries import relief).
